*Scene properties*

{{{
byte[4]    Identifier USCN
cstring    Scene name
float      Client-side transient prediction staying time in seconds
float      Client-side visual smoothing constant
float      Client-side visual smoothing position snap threshold
}}}

*Physics world properties, if extension is in use*

{{{
ushort     SDBM hash of "physicsworld"
Vector3    Gravity
uint       Physics FPS
uint       Maximum contacts per collision
float      Collision bounce velocity threshold
float      Linear velocity auto-deactivation threshold
float      Linear velocity damping threshold
float      Linear velocity damping scale
float      Angular velocity auto-deactivation threshold
float      Angular velocity damping threshold
float      Angular velocity damping scale
float      Maximum angular velocity to send over the network
float      ERP parameter
float      CFM parameter
float      Contact surface layer thickness
float      Time accumulator for next update
uint       Random seed
}}}

*Octree properties, if extension is in use*

{{{
ushort     SDBM hash of "octree"
Vector3    Root-level bounding box minimum
Vector3    Root-level bounding box maximum
uint       Octree subdivision levels
}}}

*Entities*

{{{
uint       Number of entities in scene

  For each entity:
  VLE        Entity data buffer size, for skipping in case of error
  uint       Entity ID
  cstring    Entity name
  byte       Network replication flags
  float      Maximum network update distance (0.0 = unlimited)
  uint       Group flags
  VLE        Number of properties

    For each property:
    ushort     SDBM hash of lowercase property name
    byte       Variant data type
    byte[]     Variant data, size depends on type
    bool       Network replication flag

  VLE        Number of components

    For each component:
    ushort     SDBM hash of lowercase component type name
    cstring    Component name
    byte       Network replication flags
    byte[]     Component data, size depends on type
}}}
